sent.orig: Jack didn't watch the fashion show last night because it was raining all night.
sent.trans: because可以与only,just等表示强调的副词或not,never等表示否定的副词连用。
because一词是表示原因的连接词。
象‘and’，‘but’，‘because’这样一类词是连接词。

sent.orig: Because imperialism still exists, because domestic reaction still exists, because classes still exist in our country.
sent.trans: 帝国主义还存在，国内反动派还存在，国内阶级还存在。

sent.orig: Don't cry because it is over, smile because it happened a ha!
sent.trans: 不要因为结束而哭泣，微笑吧，为你的曾经拥有，啊哈！
